cards.name: card 1
cards.title: You don't need to have done WebGL or Three.js before.
cards.description: This training is intended for absolute beginners and will explain the basics before tackling more advanced topics.

cards.name: card 2
cards.title: You don't have to be good at mathematics.
cards.description: Yes, we're going to do mathematics, but at a simple level and we will explain how it works with drawings and practice slowly.
